propDescriptions.children: In most cases will simply be a string containing a title for the label.
propDescriptions.classes: Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See CSS API below for more details.
propDescriptions.componentsProps: The props used for each slot inside.
propDescriptions.error: If true, the step is marked as failed.
propDescriptions.icon: Override the default label of the step icon.
propDescriptions.slotProps: The props used for each slot inside.
propDescriptions.StepIconComponent: The component to render in place of the StepIcon.
propDescriptions.sx: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles. See the `sx` page for more details.

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.

alternativeLabel.nodeName: the root and icon container and label

labelContainer.nodeName: the container element which wraps label and optional
